Reviews.Title: this bundle costs the same as the camera only - in other offers
Reviews.Author: Tigran Ghahramanyan
Reviews.Content: the camera is excellent.the option of having 32GB SD card and the bag was important to me, and it is also great.the rest of items in bundle are ok - the screen protector isn't very comfortable, because one needs to cut with the proper sizes and I could not manage to use it the way I want.the spare battery seems poorer than the original one - I don't very much care.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 7 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Sony Alpha NEX-6 Digital Camera Body (Black) +
<2> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card + <3> Spare NP-FW50 Battery +
<4> Sunpak 1000XL Compact Tripod + <5> PD Mini Sling Backpack +
<6> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <7> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Alpha NEX-6 Digital Camera Body (Black) with 32GB Card + Battery + Backpack + Tripod + Kit
